txt.en: You have trained a Craft Vocation, which will allow you to perform three different Craft Professions.  The trainer has given you some starter tools, and a handy guide to explain more about how to advance your career as a crafter.  Note that the starter tools are poor quality - you will want to upgrade them when you can!

You have trained a Craft Vocation, which will allow you to perform three different Craft Professions. The trainer has given you some starter tools, and a handy guide to explain more about how to advance your career as a crafter.
